DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare pharmacological profile insulin administer jet-injection insulin inject conventional insulin pen .
DOC.criteria: Age 1850 year Bodymass index 1828 kg/m2 Blood pressure < 160/90 mmHg Stable glycaemic control HbA1c 6.59.0 % ( patient type 1 diabetes mellitus ) Duration diabetes > 1 year ( patient type 1 diabetes mellitus ) Inability provide inform consent Chronic use medication oral contraceptive thyroid hormone replacement therapy ( stable euthyroidism least 3 month ) Chronic use medication insulin lowdose angiotensinconverting enzyme ( ACE ) inhibitor angiotensin receptor blocker ( ARB ) treatment ( patient type 1 diabetes mellitus ) Type 2 diabetes firstdegree relative ( healthy subject ) History major cardiovascular disease event ( myocardial infarction , stroke , symptomatic peripheral artery disease , coronary bypass surgery , percutaneous coronary peripheral artery angioplasty ) Pregnancy Macroalbuminuria , i.e . urinary albumin excretion > 200 microg/min collect urine sample urinary albumintocreatinine ratio > 300 mg/g spot urine sample ( patient type 1 diabetes mellitus ) Symptomatic diabetic neuropathy ( patient type 1 diabetes mellitus ) Proliferative diabetic retinopathy ( history proliferative retinopathy successfully treat laser coagulopathy exclusion criterion ) ( patient type 1 diabetes mellitus )
